About Me

Full-stack web developer with a passion for web technologies. I embrace a mindset of continuous learning by finding new ways to challenge myself every day! Searching for a career opportunity as a Full-Stack Web Developer with up to date skills HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, jQuery, Bootstrap, React Js, Node Js, Express, Handlebars JS, MySQL, & MongoDB from George Washington University Coding Bootcamp, Washington D.C. with Software Engineering Experience for more than four years.

My goal is to become professional in the field and gain employment in a progressive organization where my skills and experience will be utilized for individual, group and organizational growth.
